content.html: Today was actually a really baller Christmas despite self-isolating: - morning video call with my aunt & uncle - virtual knitting circle crew special holiday edition hang - MarioKart with lil bro & his fiancé - virtual time w what would have been IRL board game friend couple ...
content.value:
Today was actually a really baller Christmas despite self-isolating:

- morning video call with my aunt & uncle
- virtual knitting circle crew special holiday edition hang
- MarioKart with lil bro & his fiancé
- virtual time w what would have been IRL board game friend couple
...
